mapper.sql: id, ruid, user_id, uuid, username, user_type, terminal_type, status, start_time, end_time, duration, access_key, project, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into sd_conf_part_history (id, ruid, user_id, uuid, username, user_type, terminal_type, status, start_time, end_time, access_key, project) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ruid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sd_conf_part_history
id,
ruid,
user_id,
uuid,
username,
user_type,
terminal_type,
status,
start_time,
end_time,
duration,
access_key,
project,
create_time,
update_time,

#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update sd_conf_part_history
ruid = #{ruid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
terminal_type = #{terminalType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
access_key = #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sd_conf_part_history set ruid = #{ruid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, terminal_type = #{terminalType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, access_key = #{accessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sd_conf_part_history
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ruid = #{ruid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and status = 0
mapper.select: select a.id, a.ruid, a.user_id as userId, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.start_time) * 1000 as startTime, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.end_time)*1000 as endTime, a.duration, b.conference_subject as subject from sd_conf_part_history a INNER join sd_conference b on a.ruid = b.ruid where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.status = 1 order by a.start_time desc

select sc.room_id roomId,sc.conference_subject subject,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(scph.start_time) * 1000 createTime,scph.duration from sd_conf_part_history scph inner join sd_conference sc on scph.ruid = sc.ruid where scph.project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and scph.uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and scph.status = 1 order by scph.start_time desc
select DISTINCT sc.room_id roomId,sc.ruid,sc.project from sd_conf_part_history scph left join sd_conference sc on scph.ruid = sc.ruid where scph.end_time is null and scph.status = 0 and sc.status = 2

select
from sd_conf_part_history scph where scph.end_time is null and scph.status = 0 and scph.project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
